content.description: tiny bad crimps on a slightly over hanging face. start sitting, feet under roof on low crimps(good right, cruddy left with thumb catch)
content.location: center of look sharp, directly in front of bent tree

content.description: Start on high slightly sloping holds and make a big move left to a pinch or sidepull depending on where you hit the right facing flake.  Another move to a good crimp up and right leads to an easier finish.  The first move is by far the hardest.  Get this and you shouldn't have any problems.
content.location: In the middle of Look Sharp Rock, On the left is "See Sharp" V6, to the right is "A Minor" V2.

content.description: far right of look sharp two moves, nothing exciting, start on good holds
content.location: on look sharp to the far right

content.description: on the back of the boulder there are three problems on it with a little tree in the middle of the starting area watch out for it when you are climbing you will be able to to tell the three different problems by the chalk on them
